column4: dmraid on edgy reports my chunk size isn't divisible by the space and won't give me a mapped device, dmraid on dapper gives some other error. really sad (i have nvidia and sil fake raids and neither work)
is there a flag i can pass to the kernel when booting a livecd to stop x from starting (it locks my desktop cause it's incompatible with a 24" dell panel)
I think if you type 'server' at the prompt it will give you text-only.
clearzen was reporting a problem with the US mirror.
